column4: hi.  I am having problems using the wireless in my dell xps m1530 on ubuntu 10.10 (and many earlier editions)
if yuo run: sudo lshw -C network    and websearch for the product line, you will find guides
its not like the machine doesn't know it should have wireless, the 'bonding' just always times out
see if there are bugs or a driver update that fixes it. I suggest you use a wired connection to get fully updated
